backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining a no-op backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling of various frontend files and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE_REPORT.md: Template for recording deployment failure details and error output.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUT.md: Template file for documenting the latest deployment status, timestamp, and commands used.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook outlining steps to retry deployment using the current repository state.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, typography, layout rules, and component utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing SEO metadata, favicon links, and OG/Twitter images referencing the updated logo.
frontend/public/googled81497cd2eafdaf4.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership validation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing full crawl access and linking to the sitemap.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing the root URL with metadata for search engines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout combining header, sections, footer, SEO data, and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary ensuring the site stays accessible and provides a fallback UI on failures.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, submission success state, and controlled inputs.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile navigation panel displaying vertical links with active-state styling and navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with text content, stats cards, and optional partner listings.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows contact information with validation and a contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Displays hero section with title, subtitle, and CTA buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists services using mapped icons and card components based on site content.
frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredDat: Renders organization schema JSON-LD using site content and brand assets.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer with company info, navigation links, and validated contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides sticky header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines structured site content including company info, home hero text, about details, services list, and contact data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver hook to track and return the currently visible page section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeSeo.ts: Updates canonical and social meta tags at runtime using the current site URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the root stylesheet for the frontend.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports constants defining paths to brand logo and social image assets.
frontend/src/lib/isValidEmail.ts: Exports a basic email validation function using a simple regex check.
frontend/src/lib/siteOrigin.ts: Provides helpers to get the current site origin and build full URLs safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, fonts, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including logo redesign requirements, features, and asset update instructions.
